org.mokai.ConnectorService

Packages that use ConnectorService

Methods in org.mokai that return ConnectorService
 ConnectorService ConnectorService.addAcceptor(Acceptor acceptor)

          Adds an application with the specified id and Connector.

          Adds a connection with the specified id and Connector.

          Retrieves the application that matches the specified id.
 ConnectorService RoutingEngine.getConnection(String id)
          Returns the list of connections ordered by priority in ascendent order.
 ConnectorService ConnectorService.removeAcceptor(Acceptor acceptor)
          Removes an Acceptor from the collection of acceptors if it exists.
